tweets.text:
EA UPDATE

The @EnvAgency have issued an update this evening, ahead of the midnight deadline.

Reading between the lines, it seems that the EA are not confident that the capping work will produce the reduction in odour we have been hoping for.

This is very disappointing. (1/2) https://t.co/DIZFt1teMz

My kitchen, 2 miles away and up a hill from #WalleysQuarry, in Keele has suddenly been filled with the smell of landfill! @EnvAgencyMids sort it out! This is now a human rights issue! People can't enjoy their own homes. #StopTheStink

@a_merrydew @SuzVW @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA Please continue to report via phone if you can -  this is the official advice. üëáIf not save your email and send once the system is back up. Isn‚Äôt it funny how these issues always happen on a weekend. #stopthestink https://t.co/XZ3wjNhNDW

@SuzVW @Tus_M_ @EnvAgency @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA My emails have been bouncing back lately so I rang up this morning. I asked how long the email will be down and was told it *should* be working by the end of today. I was given another email address; however, the email address has not been changed on their website...

urls.title: Catlytic converter theft
urls.description: Welcome to the online home of Dorset Police. Find advice, statistics, and crime prevention help. Report a crime or contact us online.

tweets.text:
We're working with @EnvAgencySW and trading standards in the fight against catalytic converter thefts. 

If you want to protect your vehicle from these thefts visit https://t.co/qwTwSLirVq for more advice. 

#StopThief üöó https://t.co/njbSr6owzU

What @ClareDinnisEA doesn‚Äôt explain in her interviews is why @EnvAgency were so slow to react to the current crisis and that they increased the permitted waste tonnage to the landfill in Oct 2020 even though odour complaints were on the rise!Negligent! @ShaunLintern #stopthestink https://t.co/i7h920bJNu https://t.co/wPyRTkwcTz

tweets.text: @ClareDinnisEA you spoke to @AaronBell4NUL, perhaps you would like to inform him and the residents of Newcastle-under-Lyme why the @EnvAgency‚Äôs technology is so poor? First the monitoring station isn‚Äôt active during the worst weekend. Now your email ‚Äúbreaks‚Äù so we can‚Äôt report.

You can‚Äôt make this up. The email for reporting to the @EnvAgency has now ‚Äúbroken‚Äù so you need to call to report the stink. This is very convenient as most people have been told to email in; emails hold more sway in a court of law. @StinkStopthe @ClareDinnisEA what is happening?

‚ÄúMathew seems to be clearly suffering from the environmental fumes he is subjected to on a regular basis given they live so close to the landfill‚Äù
 
A Doctors words, not mine @PHE_uk 

#StopTheStink #MayDay #StaffordshireDay @AaronBell4NUL @BBCNews @itvnews @Channel5N @SOPH_C_ https://t.co/myICuzRCvy

tweets.text:
Glad to talk to Stuart George today & be clear on the @EnvAgencyMids ongoing plan beyond the #enforcement notice deadline for capping at #WalleysQuarry. 

This is our next focus & we'll share more next week once we've done the assurance on @RedIndustries2 work so far. https://t.co/eIXsWqD1s0

The @EnvAgency calculate that Affinity Water are over abstracting local chalk streams to the tune of about 430 million litres of water per day.

That's almost 10% of the world's total supply of chalk streams degraded for profit.

Let's talk about a clean conscience shall we. https://t.co/J8nQmVNWlv

@maireadc_2010 @sunnyraisin62 @StinkStopthe @fayedavies @RedIndustries2 @EnvAgencyMids It's not the road i'd choose but now it looks like the only one left . I think they bank on people losing interest and leaving things to bumble along , not this community and I hope yours too .
I am sick üò∑ü§¢ and tired üò¥ of waking up this way. üòû

Aaaanybody fancy coming to measure the levels of gas in my home this afternoon? We had to escape last night and apparently it was shocking there so the house will be full of it! @NewsNBC @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids

In the @RiverChess  and Misbourne valleys all at risk when the HS2 tunnelling work starts in the next few weeks. Despite so many requests for data and answers to questions to the @EnvAgency  still outstanding. I hope EA staff are checking their professional indemnity insurance. https://t.co/t6b6bEeDvt
Thank you @SimonTagg for saying this !!! We do.!! Stench filled room again today. @EnvAgency @EnvAgencyMids @PHE_uk @PHE_WestMids @Cap_it_off https://t.co/2htF7p1lKd

@19rodders71 @EnvAgency Why lookey here, Lord De Mauley, Minister for the Environment telling the HoL the EA "Will soon use its powers to revoke or vary abstraction licences without compensation where they are causing serious damage to the environment". 4th Feb 2014.

How's that one working out? https://t.co/quhX554QyQ

Reflecting on what a fantastic community we have, all walks of life uniting to fight big industry & greed for the sake of our health , our friends & neighbours health & our children #staffordshireday #stopthestink #stillstinks @Cap_it_off @EnvAgency @AaronBell4NUL @StinkStopthe https://t.co/P7porQ2DAK

@sunnyraisin62 @StinkStopthe @maireadc_2010 @fayedavies Count me in too , This has gone to far and legal action is needed now not just against @RedIndustries2 but also against @EnvAgencyMids for their lack of action ,and their response to our plight .

@DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice we demand you listen to our councillors @NewsNBC . We demand a public enquiry into the questionable conduct of the @EnvAgency & whether ongoing work with @RedIndustries2 should be led by @DefraGovUK #stopthestink #stillstinks https://t.co/YjPAm7E0Wn

Walleys Landfill is the air clean now?Can I come out of my ‚Äòstink‚Äô fallout room? Are the bodies piled high? Is it safe now? @EnvAgency is it safe? @RedIndustries2 is it safe?@PHE_uk What is the risk? Is #StaffordshireDay still happening @NewsNBC @StinkStopthe #stopthestink https://t.co/uu9bzMNyiZ

@SianieRoo @EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA Does #publichealthengland understand exposure to these toxins is several hours every day when they say no risk to health, short term we don't recover from 1 exposure before next onslaught. #stopthestink

Off to Cornwall for the bank holiday with your family?  Check out this video from @sascampaigns showing raw sewage going straight into the Gannel Estuary near to Newquay and Crantock beach Shouldn‚Äôt @SouthWestWater be fined? @EnvAgency Cc @DefraGovUK https://t.co/YQAQ0nrVX2

The @EnvAgency are not objective, they don‚Äôt share our vision for resolution.Their focus is keeping @RedIndustries2 in Wallys &covering their own backsides. We have no faith in Chief Head Patter for the Midlands @ClareDinnisEA @DefraGovUK @BorisJohnson #stopthestink #stillstinks https://t.co/YjPAm7E0Wn

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile
entity.description: Stories are shared of the people, places and issues at the heart of the British countryside. Popular features include the programme's photography contest, which culminates in a yearly calendar sold to benefit charity, the Video Diary, produced by viewers and focused on life in rural areas, and the weather forecasts.

domain.name: TV Shows
domain.description: Television shows from around the world

entity.name: Countryfile Diaries
entity.description: A sister show to the BBC's `Countryfile' series, this rural affairs programme sees a team of presenters travel the length and breadth of the United Kingdom to cover stories related to the British countryside and the season of spring. As this period is a busy time of the year for the farming and outdoor communities in particular, regular topics covered include the production of food, nature conservation, and a look at a chosen area's culture and history. Stunning landscapes and a variety of wildlife also feature prominently.
